Body:
template = Template(
    """

            <%self:foo x="5">
                <%block>
                    this is the block x
                </%block>
            </%self:foo>

            <%def name="foo(x)">
                foo:
                ${caller.body()}
            </%def>
        """
    )
self._do_test(template, ['foo:', 'this is the block x'], filters=result_lines)
